author: Jordan Joshua Lewis
content:
There is no better cheap eat in MCR. Every curry on selection is insanely delicious with the bread and samosas being cheap additions to fill you up.

We went for a takeout this weekend and for 2 x decent sized curries with 2 large breads it was just Â£17. And you KNOW it's gonna hit the spot unlike some takeaways.

It's chaotic inside sometimes, some staff are a little blunt but it's not in a bad way. It adds to the good vibe in some unexplainable way.
